Canvas (canvas)¶

Canvas¶

The canvas package contains classes for visualizing the contents of a Scheme, utilizing the Qt’s Graphics View Framework.

  • Canvas Scene (scene)
    • Canvas Graphics Scene
  • Node Item (nodeitem)
    • Node Item
  • Link Item (linkitem)
    • Link Item
  • Annotation Items (annotationitem)
